entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
